text:
Sylvia Leticia Martínez Elizondo (20 November 1947 – 9 July 2020) was a Mexican politician. She was born in Chihuahua City, Chihuahua. She was a member of the National Action Party. Between 2016 to 2018, Martínez Elizondo was a Senator from Chihuahua.
Martínez Elizondo died on 9 July 2020 in Monterrey, Nuevo Leon at the age of 72.
